channel.title: Beijing Inn
channel.description: Serving Chinese cuisines since 1989, the Beijing Inn remains as one of gillinghams most rememberd chinese restaurants with over 20 years of experience.

item.title: Website is up and running!
item.description: The website is up and running! feel free to check out the new pictures uploaded and our menus to download. Keep up to date with this new rss feed for events and offers!
